@044B PA'I MTSAMS ZHU 'BUL MIR THON PHYAG 'BYOR LAN GNANG, ZLA
BA GSUM PA'I TSES BZHI LA DBANG CHEN NO MON HAN GYI KHU REL
GYI DBU MDZAD MDANGS CHEN PA DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS
DANG, THU SA LAG CHI'I MI SNA YE SHES SMON LAM SO SO NAS DNGOS
'BUL GYI BDOG

PA DANG, 'GRUL SDEB GZHAN MAS KYANG DNGOS 'BYOR BSTABS, DE'I
PHYI NYIN HAL HA TSO BA BDUN NAS DNGUL DKAR LAS GRUB PA'I
MAndAL, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN, NA BZA' NYER SPYAD, GSER SRANG
BRGYA DANG LNGA BCU, DNGUL SRANG BDUN STONG BZHI BRGYA NYI SHU
RTZA BRGYAD,

GOS CHEN YUG SUM CU SO DRUG SOGS DNGUL DANG DNGOS PO SNA TSOGS
BSDOMS DNGUL SRANG CHIG KHRI'I RTZIS KYI DNGOS 'BUL BTAG STE
ZHABS BRTAN BDEN TSIG BRJOD CING NO YON CHOS RJE DANG, RJE
BTZUN DAM PA'I GSOL DPON NGO G-YOG LA PHYAG DBANG JA GRAL

GNANG, TSES BRGYAD LA CHING WANG BDE CHEN SKYABS KYI BLA MA
DGON KHRA BA DKA' BCU TSE BDAG DANG, RGYAL CHEN RTZE BA NO MON
HAN GYI TSA BO YAR 'PHEL, DRUNG RAM PA LNGA 'DZOM BCAS SO SO
NAS DNGOS 'BUL BSTAR, TSES BCU GCIG LA SNAR THANG DU RGYUD PA
GRVA TSANG BA

BLA GRVA SUM CU SO GCIG GIS BSTAN 'GYUR GYI GSUNG PAR RNAMS LA
RAB GNAS MDZAD PAR YON KYANG BSTABS, SKABS 'DIR 'BRUM NAD KYI
DOGS GZHIR BRTEN TSANG MAR MJAL KHA GNANG MA BDE YANG NO YON
CHOS RJE DANG GSOL DPON AER KHE THO YON SOGS

NGOM RNAMS DANG RAGS BSDUS KHA SHAS, DZA YA PAndI TA'I SPRUL
SKU NGO G-YOG NYUNG BSDUS BCAS LA THON PHYAG GI PHYAG DBANG
DANG MI SNA ZLA BCAS LA SO SOR BSRUNG MDUD, BYIN RTEN SKU

BA MDZAD CING LHAG GNAS KYI ME TOG KYANG GTONG,

TSIG GI ZHAL BYANG CAN GSER THAM 'BYAR BA, LHA RDZAS BZANG PO'I
SNYAN SHAL BCAS PHUL NAS SPYAN 'DREN KHRUS GSOL MCHOD 'BUL SOGS
MDZAD DE SHIS PA BRJOD PA'I

ME TOG GTOR, NGO MTSAR THUB PA'I SNANG BRNYAN LA, ,KHYAD 'PHAGS
BZANG GOS NA BZA' NI, ,'CHI MED GOS LA 'GRAN BZOD PA, ,PHUL TE
THUGS SMON YANG DAG MDZAD, ,TSES GSUM GYI NYIN SPYI BSKYUR GYI
TSOGS DBUR PHEBS, TSES BRGYAD

KYI NYIN BZHAD THUB BSTAN SKYID SPUG PAS TSOGS DBUR SPYAN DRANGS
TE ZHABS BRTAN PHUL ZHING, TSOGS YONGS LA BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR
GYI LUNG GNANG, TSES BCU LA SLE PHU GNYER PA DRUNG RAM PA BLO
BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DNGOS 'BUL DANG BCAS

ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS ZHUS, TSES BCO LNGA NAS BZUNG ZHAG BDUN
GYI RING TSE CHOG SGRUB MCHOD MDZAD SKABS SNGAGS GRVA'I 'DU
KHANG DU RGYAL BA TSE DPAG MED DANG SGROL DKAR YID BZHIN 'KHOR
LO, MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU,

DMAG ZOR RGYAL MO BCAS KYI SNANG BRNYAN GOS LHAN THABS LAS GRUB
PA, RIN PO CHE'I RGYAN GYIS MDZES BA SBYOR 'JAGS MDZAD, SNGAGS
'CHANG 'DUS SNGE'I PAD MTSO NI, ,TSE CHOG 'OD DKAR DANG 'GROGS
PAS, ,'CHI MED RLABS 'PHRENG

G-YO BA YIS, ,MTHAR BYED YID LA GDUNG BA 'DZIN, ,ZLA BA 'DI'I
TSES BCU GSUM GYI NYIN RGYAL DBANG MCHOG LHA LDAN SMON LAM GYI
TSOGS DBUR ZHABS ZUNG BKOD PA'I THOG MAR SONG GSHIS, LEGS SKYES
DNGOS 'BUL RGYA CHEN PO DANG

@257B CHABS CIG 'DUS PA RGYA MTSOR MANG JA'I THOG 'GYED BKRA
SHIS PA'I KHA BTAGS RE DANG RNAM GZHAG BCAS KYI BSNYEN BKUR
'PHAR MA DANG, DE MTSUNGS RGYAL DBANG RIN PO CHER YANG CHAB SHOG
TSIGS BCAD MA SNYAN NGAG GI LAM NAS DRANGS PA

BCAS 'BUL BAR MGRON GNYER BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN RDZONG STA MDZAD,
ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I NANG DU YONGS 'DZIN ZHAL SNGA NAS LAS BDE
MCHOG BONG ZHAL CAN GYI DBANG GSAN, GLING GI GRU GSAR BZO LA
DNGOS PO'I MTHUN RKYEN GNANG, TSES BCU GNYIS

LA GRVA PA BCO LNGA BSNYEN RDZOGS DANG, LA DVAGS HE MI'I GRVA PA
SUM CU SO LNGA DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, TSES BCO LNGA LA SER 'BRAS PA
DANG, RONG BYAMS CHEN SOGS KYI GRVA PA BZHI BCU ZHE LNGA BSNYEN
RDZOGS BSGRUBS, TSES BCU BDUN GYI NYIN DGA'

LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING BA MKHAN SLOB GRVA DMANGS DANG BCAS PA
BYON NAS GNAS BRTAN PHYAG MCHOD DANG 'BREL BA'I ZHABS BRTAN PHUL
ZHING RDO RJE SLOB DPON GYIS SGER MJAL ZHUS, TSOGS YONGS LA GRUB
RGYAL LUGS KYI TSE DBANG DANG SLOG CHA MANG

'GYED BCAS STZAL, PHYOGS 'DUS GRVA PA LNGA BCU RTZA LNGA BSNYEN
RDZOGS BSGRUBS, TSES NYER LNGA LA 'PHAGS YUL LI MA LHA KHANG DU
ZHABS ZUNG BKOD DE RJE BTZUN MA'I SNANG BRNYAN GSUNG 'BYOR GTING
SKYES SGROL MAR GRAGS PA LA GSER SBYANGS SRANG

SUM CU SO GCIG LAS GRUB PA'I DBU GDUGS BZO BKOD RMAD DU BYUNG BA
RIN PO CHE'I PHRA LDAN, GOS BZANG PO'I NA BZA' NANG NGOS SU BKA'
RTZOM SMON TSIG GIS BRGYAN PA, CHU SHEL GYI MAR ME'I RGYAL MTSAN
BCAS PHUL TE RE ZHIG BAR DGE SLONG
